item.title: Darian Liang
item.description:
Darian Liang

Computer Science Student @ Northwestern University
Aspiring Software Engineer • Open Source Contributor • Problem Solver

LinkedIn | GitHub | darianjliang@gmail.com | Chicago, IL

Experience

Computer Consulting Aide – Northwestern University McCormick School of Engineering

Oct 2024 – Present · Evanston, IL

  • Help users diagnose and solve software/hardware issues in person and remotely.
  • Enforce data protection policies and image university devices.
  • Maintain lab computers and assist IT with system updates.

Technical Requirements Contributor – Open Supply Hub

Jun 2024 – Sep 2024 · Chicago, IL
